page.title: 20SERVICES IN STOURBRIDGE
page.content: The{Water Supply}in Stourbridge is somewhat unusual in that it is provided from boreholes into Sandstone which underlines a large part of the area. The water is pumped from the boreholes into the main system and covered service reservoirs. {Gas and Electricity}are provided by the Midlands Electricity Board and the West Midland Gas Board who have taken over smaller local companies. The{Telephone Exchange}on the Ring Road around Stourbridge has recently been converted from a manual exchange to the electronic SYSTEM X. Other services such as Social Services, Housing and Planning ans Development are administrated by Dudley Metropolitan Borough Council.
